line_1: Then never wou'd thy Colours have debas'd
line_2: CLEONE's Features, and her Charms defac'd:

line_1: Nations of Slaves, with Tyranny debas'd,
line_2: (Their Maker's Image more than half defac'd)

line_1: And that a nation shamefully debas'd,
line_2: Will be despis'd and trampl'd on at last,

line_1: Have basely turn'd Apostates, have debas'd
line_2: Their dignity of office, have disgrac'd,
In half the female world at least!
' Is quite discarded from the realms of taste.

line_1: Then by vile Hands to common Use debas'd;
line_2: Shall send them flowing round his drunken Feast,

line_1: Then by vile Hands to common Use debas'd;
line_2: With sacrilegious Taunt, and impious Jest.

line_1: The Muse I never have debas'd;
line_2: My Lays are innocent at least;
